publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6257 Dr Richard Simpson: Stirling Sporting Success—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling Albion Football Club for winning the Scottish Football League Division Two Championship and Stirling County Rugby Football Club for winning the Premier Two Division in Scottish Rugby, with both teams gaining promotion to Division One and the Premier One Division respectively, which, taken together with the University of Stirling’s recent designation by the Scottish Government as the University of Sporting Excellence, indicate the success of Stirling in sport.

S3M-6257Dr Richard Simpson:Stirling Sporting Success—That the Parliament congratulates Stirling Albion Football Club for winning the Scottish Football League Division Two Championship and Stirling County Rugby Football Club for winning the Premier Two Division in Scottish Rugby, with both teams gaining promotion to Division One and the Premier One Division respectively, which, taken together with the University of Stirling’s recent designation by the Scottish Government as the University of Sporting Excellence, indicate the success of Stirling in sport.

S3M-6257 Stirling Sporting Success (lodged on 5 May 2010) Mary Mulligan*, David Stewart*, Helen Eadie*, Rhona Brankin*, Bill Butler*, John Park*, Sandra White*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jackie Baillie*, James Kelly*
S3M-6257 Stirling Sporting Success (lodged on 5 May 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Stuart McMillan*, Trish Godman*
S3M-6257 Stirling Sporting Success (lodged on 5 May 2010) Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*
